response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is indeed worth $12,000 to you. However, to facilitate a smoother transaction and cater to your budgetary considerations, I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $10,800. This special offer represents a significant saving of $1,200, making it an attractive proposition for you. Please let me know if this offer meets your requirements and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10800}
